article: It happened many years ago, and I was in high school then. Being a student from a _ family, I had to work on weekends to make some extra money that my family couldn't really _ to give me, and one day after work I lost my wallet. My old car _ gas in the back. I paid for the gas and then put my wallet on the bumper ,and drove off. I hadn't even had time to _ it when my phone rang and an old man asked me _ I had lost my wallet. I checked the _ of my jacket and to my horror, I had. He asked me to tell him how much money was _ it, and I told him. He then told me where to pick up my wallet. As I drove into his driveway, I _ that his car was for the _ . I was thinking that there was no way this man could _ get out of hid car and get my wallet off the _ . He had to pull over, _ in his wheelchair, lower the lift, and then pick it up, I was _ . I knocked on the _ and he told me to come in. I thanked him like 10 times for _ my wallet. While I didn't want to make him angry by offering him _ , I really felt like offering something. So I asked him if there was anything I could do to repay his _ , and he said, "Just pass _ on." I really wanted to thank him, so I _ promised I would.
